Name: @/Name/UnitC_1
Description_: At the start of the battle, *Destroy* self. *Death rattle*: Equip <UNIT>14002|1</UNIT> to *adjacent* empty grids.

Name: @/Name/UnitC_2
Description_: At the start of the battle, *Destroy* self. *Death rattle*: Equip <UNIT>@.unitB|2</UNIT> to empty grids in the *same lane*.

Name: @/Name/UnitD_1
Description_: On load, play a different looping animation.

Name: @/Name/UnitD_2
Description_: On load, play the animation once, then reset.
